passage.text:
It's taken me 10 years to get here. 
  I've been promoted to the senior Maintence team 
 now I find myself here, 
 in the belly of the beast. In the server cooling farms of Vault 25 
 I'm not sure what to expect, but I'm ready for anything.  
 I need to find the tech on watch and talk to him first.
You tap on the old computers interface. \n  A rudimentay UI pops up with several options
It's my first day, best to leave it alone. \n I don't want to break anything.
